snippet.title: moonflash/WAV-MP3\---paperclip-processor
snippet.description:
Simple WAV-MP3 gem/paperclip processor. Converts uploaded wav files to mp3 using lame
Last updated May 05, 2011

snippet.title: pacso/paperclip-wav-mp3
snippet.description:
Paperclip processor to convert .wav files to .mp3 using ffmpeg
Last updated February 19, 2014

snippet.title: ohrobot/MP3-Batch
snippet.description:
[Ruby] Batch convert all WAV files stored in a folder to MP3
Last updated October 31, 2010

snippet.title: jphellemons/ConvertMp3ToWav
snippet.description:
This console app converts mp3's to wav format
Last updated February 28, 2014

snippet.title: Pescolly/Mass-MP3-Encoder
snippet.description:
Goes thru directory and converts any .wav files to .mp3 using LAME.
Last updated December 30, 2013

snippet.title: rchrd2/wav2mp3
snippet.description:
Helper to convert wav to mp3 using ffmpeg.
Last updated February 07, 2013

snippet.title: chris-magic/mp3_2_wav
snippet.description:
convert mp3 file to wav file use ffmpeg library
Last updated February 19, 2013

snippet.title: tjwudi/Mp32Wav
snippet.description:
convert mp3 audio file to wav audio file
Last updated January 25, 2014

snippet.title: yk0011/WAVEConverter
snippet.description:
Convert ".cue", ".wav" and ".log" files into ".mp3" and store them on ".zip"
Last updated October 14, 2013

snippet.title: FrontSide/oggconv
snippet.description:
Converts OGG Audio Files into MP3 or WAV
Last updated April 20, 2014
